name: 張瑋倫　Office Hours
objective: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.
schedule:
9/14 Orientation
9/21 Digital transformation / Disney
9/28 Importance of ICT / Netflix
10/5 Competition of ICT / Cirque du Soleil
10/12 BPR / Schiphol Airport
10/19 ERP / ERP in Hospital
11/26 CRM / HEC Montreal
11/2 SCM /Amazon
11/9 Midterm week
11/16 ICT in HRM / Weather News
11/23 ICT in marketing / Weather Company
11/30 ICT in finance / Wealthfront
12/7 ICT in OM / Warby Parker
12/14 ICT decisions / WestJet Airlines
12/21 Discussion
12/28 Keynote speaker 
1/4 Final Presentation
materials: The prepared slides and material for reading.
